titleStmt.title: A Bibliography of Publications related to the Text Encoding Initiative
titleStmt.author: Susan Schreibman

availability.p: Copyright 2007 Text Encoding Initiative Consortium. It is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution&ShareAlike 2.0 England & Wales licence

Permission is granted to copy for any non-commercial purpose. Permission to modify is also granted, provided that the information in the original TEI Header is retained. The TEI Consortium actively encourages readers to submit additions, corrections, etc. to the TEI (by sending e-mail either toKevin Hawkins or the editors .
